articles.title: UK coronavirus death toll increases to 33614 as further 428 deaths confirmed - ITV News
articles.description:
A further 428 people have died after testing positive for coronavirus in the UK, taking the total to 33,614, the Department of Health and Social Care have confirmed.

The Government also met its daily target for 100,000 Covid-19 tests, according to the latest…
